name: NEON SLAYER
description:
Overview

NEON SLAYER is an action-packed fast-paced deathmatch arena, where your only weapons are reflexes. It is set in a futuristic abstraction of a vaporwave inspired/themed world. In this game, your goal is to make other players crash into your tail.

Gameplay

It is heavily inspired by TRON, this game offers various game modes player can participate in.

These are the game modes NEON SLAYER would support:

Deathmatch*

In this mode, your only task is to deceive the enemy to make him collide with your tail. Whether done by using power-ups, hunting, relying on tactics or pure luck is up to one's approach. Victory conditions are determined by a number of kills caused by solo player.

Team Deathmatch*

The same freestyle deathmatch game session, with a twist! Now players have to team up to fight others. Victory conditions are determined by a number of kills caused by either side.

Capture The Points*

In this special mode, players focus on collecting random relics spawned on the map. Victory conditions are determined by a number of relics collected over a set time.

Battle Royale*

Deathmatch gameplay with an enclosing laser circle causing tension. Victory conditions are determined by the last man standing.

Freeroam

Deathmatch without time limit. No victory conditions, good for practice.

Survival*

In this mode, AI tries to hunt your group. Victory conditions are to survive a time limit.

*Work in progress
